definitions.definition: The small mass of cells from which a new organism develops ; a seed , bud , spore , or zygote .

subdefinitions.definition: The embryo of a seed , especially of a seed used as a cereal or grain . See Wikipedia article on cereal germ .
The small mass of cells from which a part of an organism develops , or a macroscopic but immature form of that part; a bud .
examples: surgical removal of germs of wisdom teeth

definitions.definition: A pathogen : a pathogenic microorganism , such as a bacterium or virus .
The origin or earliest version of an idea or project .
An equivalence class that includes a specified function defined in an open neighborhood .

main_definition: ( biology ) The small mass of cells from which a new organism develops ; a seed , bud , spore , or zygote .
secondary_definitions: A pathogen : a pathogenic microorganism , such as a bacterium or virus .
( figurative ) The origin or earliest version of an idea or project .
( mathematics ) An equivalence class that includes a specified function defined in an open neighborhood .
